1.content:
Red walked up to a creek, sitting on the bank and putting his bare feet in the water. He'd been walking for two days now and the cool water was soothing on his feet. He leaned back propping himself up on his elbows and looking up at the sky above, he hadn't wanted to leave his village but he wanted to.live his life with out all the laws that restricted the people of the village. He sighed and took off his dirt covered shirt, rinsing it off in the water, he had a toned body and a slight tan from working outside and good sized muscles from pounding metal in his fathers blacksmith shop. His red orange bangs fell down over his beautiful blue eyes. He set his shirt down on thr grass and the layed back himself. He heard something in the brush behind him, but he didn't see anything so he wrote it off as nothing before drifting off into a light sleep.

But there was somthing there... But who are they?

15.content:
The hunter was running, and had been since the night before, from wat he wasnt completly sure. He'd been seperated from his hunting team a few days before and had been chased by... Something ever since. He stopped and leaned against a tree, panting. 'I can't keep going like this' he thought 'I have to face this thing' he pulled out a large curved knife, he had a gun, but it was a musket and took to long to load.
"Do you really think thats a good idea" the voice sound smoother than ice and twice as cold "better hunters than you have tried that and all of them failed"
"Why don't you show yourself and we'll find out" sweat beaded up on his forehead, he was bluffing, and bad.
"Hehe well I suppose I may as well" a man stepped out from behind a tree. He couldn't have been any older than the hunter, and may have even been younger. He was shirtless and despite a small bulge in his stomach had a fairly lean build. The hunter almost felt embarrassed for being afraid, but when he spoke it sent chills up his spine. "it seems we've both tired of cat and mouse, what to play next" he tapped his finger on his chin and looked up in thought.
"You..." The hunter's voice was trembling " Where are the other men, why were you chasing me" and first time he notice th sand colored tail flicking behind the man "What are you!"
"Ah, that's right!" In a flash he had the hunter pinned against the tree "I think I forgot to mention it but me and your freinds have been playing hide and seek for sometime now, and your it. I'll give you a hint about where they are" he leaned in close to the hunter, so close that the mans blond hair rub the hunters ear. "They're inside me" the hunters eyes opened wide 'no way' he thought 'i...it's not possible' The blonde boy shrugged and smiled "So, you know the game right, you go in here" he pats his tummy "and tag 'em and u win! Piece a cake!"
'Does this guy think I'm an idiot' "I not gonna play your twisted game" he tried to stab the man in the arm but, without flinching, he swatted the knife away and it fell to the forest floor, useless.
"Well that's a shame, oh well" he smiled maliciously "At I know you'll struggle"
The hunter screamed as the boy opened his mouth wide and began his newest meal.

After words the man sat spread on the grass, his bulging belly across his lap he burped and licked his lips before he heard something else, splashing? He looked through the trees and saw a particularly tastey looking red haired boy sleeping alone by the creek 'Why hello' the wolf boy smiled 'Now what should we play?'
